values: God Is Most Glorified in Us When We Are Most Satisfied in HimGod Is Most Glorified in Us When We Are Most Satisfied in Him

God’s design to pursue his own glory turns out to be love. And our duty to pursue God’s glory turns out to be a quest for joy.God’s design to pursue his own glory turns out to be love. And our duty to pursue God’s glory turns out to be a quest for joy.
